game_name: Tennis League VR - Early Access Demo
game_description: Designed for casual fans or aspiring pros, Tennis League VR delivers the thrill of intense rallies and the triumph of landing the perfect ace. Use real tennis techniques to dominate the leaderboards and smash the competition. Virtual champions can play solo or online across a variety of game modes. Download Tennis League VRâ€™s free demo and join over 70,000 other players who have already lobbed, sliced, and drop shot their way to matchpoint. Experience the most precise tennis physics outside of the real thing! Refine your swing with exercises, challenges, and more. ~FULL GAME NOW AVAILABLE ON THE META STORE~ ~Full Game Features~ ðŸŽ¾ Become a VR Tennis Ace Jump into Career mode and compete in tournaments against challenging AI opponents across numerous different courts. ðŸŽ¾ Training Lessons Learn the basics of ground strokes, volleys, and serves with the robust Training Mode, which includes customizable ball cannon practice options and engaging skill challenges. ðŸŽ¾ Droid Rush Mode Master your swing against a swarm of robot invaders in Droid Rush. Hone your aim and take out those shields quickly! ðŸŽ¾Online Multiplayer Test your skills against other players online from around the globe. Invite up to 8 friends to jeer or cheer you on from the sidelines. ðŸŽ¾ Multiple Control Options Move around the court by teleporting or using analog stick movement, and customize your playstyle
review_1: Updated: Developer responded and pointed me to change to Simulation physics which are really good. Updating to 5-stars. Graphics are good but I'd rather watch a movie. Game play should flow well and physics should be precise for me to be able to swing the arms and land the shots precisely. Its just not there. First Person Tennis is superior to this game.
review_2: This game is honestly going to be a blast, from the way every shot feels coming off your racket, to the character customization, to the wide array of courts available itâ€™s a must buy for anyone looking for a new VR tennis experience!
review_3: I found tennis league vr a while ago and played it with my friends and it was a blast !!! I canâ€™t wait for the full game !! I was a little disappointed when I couldnâ€™t play online on the demo anymore but then I saw that the full game was coming out !! Do we have any idea how much itâ€™ll be ? Canâ€™t wait !!
review_4: I need this game. Is more better than the other tennis game in Meta Store. I love your game but is only a demo. When? I hate play again and again exhibition. I want more places, players and a carreer mode. For me is the best tennis game
review_5: Based on the demo this game has the potential to be an amazing time killer. Graphically it's functional, nothing too flashy but everything seems solid and well rendered. The physics seem spot on, with the ability to put spin on the ball. The controls seem very intuitive as you would imagine and the teleport movement works extremely well. Very interested to see how this plays against other people.
